item.title: Make MacOS Notifications From RSS Feed Using Python
item.description: Today we are going to see how make OSX notifications from RSS Feed of any website using Python. So first of all, let us see how to make a simple notification. We are going to use AppleScript for this.Table of contents  Command for notification in AppleScript Start coding for application Integrate AppleScript in application In conclusion
